      • valueToDays

        public static java.util.EnumSet<com.nfcalarmclock.system.NacCalendar.Day> valueToDays(int value)
        Convert a value to a set of days.
        Parameters:
        value - The value of a set of days. Each day has a unique, 2^n, value so only one bit is set. Doing a bitwise-and of a day should compute to 1 if you have the correct day.
        Returns:
        A set of enum days.
